headline: Assessing Albemarle (ALB) Valuation After A Sharp 90 Day Share Price Rebound
summary: Putting Albemarle’s Recent Moves in Context Albemarle (ALB) has been drawing attention after a sharp total return over the past year alongside mixed shorter term moves, with the shares last closing at US$163.37. Here is how the current setup looks. See our latest analysis for Albemarle. The recent 4.4% one day share price return, alongside a 68.11% 90 day share price return, contrasts with Albemarle’s 115.54% one year total shareholder return and weaker three and five year total shareholder...
